title: 04/05/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 04/05/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On today’s Dan Patrick Show, DP and the guys come back from the weekend to set the stage for tonight’s National Championship game between Baylor and Gonzaga. CBS and MSG Network analyst Wally Szczerbiak joined the show to talk about how Gonzaga, and Drew Timmie are the favorites for tonight’s game and what Baylor has to do to spoil the undefeated season. As for Gonzaga, former Zag and current radio analyst for the team, Adam Morrison called in to talk about how Saturday’s win got the monkey off of his back from his loss against UCLA back in 2006. Lastly, with the national championship tonight and the Master’s this upcoming weekend, Jim Nantz chats with Dan about how he’s fared in the Indy bubble and how he will shift gears to golf after tonight’s game.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
